title: Mantis BS3 Style Table Lamp Cream
body: A masterpiece of Bernard Schottlander from his 1951 Mantis-series creations, where a system of counterweights combined with strong and flexible metal poles makes the Mobelaris style Mantis Lamps look like they're defying gravity. Made from Aluminium/Carbon Steel frame and an elongated conical shade that rotates to direct light dowards exuding quiet drama. A fabulous statement piece that will brighten your space for years to come.
